# UITextSmartDashesType.no

**Case**

Disable smart dashes.

## Declaration

```swift
case no
```

## Constants

- **UITextSmartDashesType.default**: Use the default smart dash behavior.
- **UITextSmartDashesType.yes**: Enable smart dashes.

items.description: Use the default smart dash behavior.
